name: G (Identity)
awareness: identity / direction / love (magnetic monopole seat, not an awareness center)
biological_themes: Liver / blood regulation (core identity as ‘life direction’ in the body)
Sternum / chest axis as locus of self and love
Magnetic monopole correspondence (holds you together in time/space)
Orientation / navigation circuitry (inner GPS → outer behavior)

fears.label: Fear of having no direction
fears.description: Anxiety that life is drifting without a correct, love-based trajectory.

fears.label: Fear of not belonging
fears.description: Concern that your identity won’t be received or invited into the collective story.

fears.label: Fear of losing self-love
fears.description: Worry that the self will be forced to act outside of its correct behavior.

fears.label: Fear of misalignment
fears.description: Tension about being on the wrong path, in the wrong place, with the wrong people.

gates.name: 1 — The Creative
gates.core_theme: Pure, individual creative self-expression from identity.
gates.notes: When the G is defined with Gate 1, identity wants to create simply because it is. Not-self tries to prove creativity instead of letting it flow.

gates.name: 2 — The Receptive (Direction of the Self)
gates.core_theme: Receiving the correct direction for the self.
gates.love_theme: Love of being guided / love of correct direction.
gates.notes: This is where the magnetic monopole ‘steers’ the vehicle. Healthy 2 waits; unhealthy 2 tries to choose with the mind.
sources: HD lectures on the Magnetic Monopole

gates.name: 7 — The Role of the Self in Interaction
gates.core_theme: The identity that can lead for the collective.
gates.love_theme: Love of leading and being aligned with the group.
gates.notes: Natural leadership from identity, not ego. Wants the 31 in the Throat to voice it. Not-self 7 pushes leadership without invitation.

gates.name: 10 — Behavior of the Self
gates.circuitry: Individual (Centering) – Love of self / survival of behavior
gates.core_theme: Correct, empowered self-behavior that preserves life.
gates.love_theme: Love of self through correct behavior.
quotes: “Behavior that is true to the self.”
gates.notes: This is the backbone of self-love. Distortions show up as people-pleasing or self-sabotage. Pairs with 34 for pure empowerment.
sources: Self-Love and the G Center – HD classes

gates.name: 13 — The Listener (The Fellowship of Man)
gates.core_theme: Holding stories of the past for the collective.
gates.love_theme: Love of hearing / holding the story.
gates.notes: Opens identity to others’ stories. With 33 it becomes the entire narrative cycle. Not-self 13 overshares or overidentifies with stories.

gates.name: 15 — Extremes
gates.core_theme: Embodying and accepting extremes of human rhythm.
quotes: “Love of humanity in all its diversity.”
gates.notes: Adjusts to wide environmental swings. With 5 it becomes a consistent flow. Not-self 15 performs extremes for attention.

gates.name: 25 — The Innocent (Spirit of the Self)
gates.core_theme: Universal, innocent love independent of circumstance.
gates.notes: This is unconditional identity. With 51 it initiates through the heart. Distortion: moralism or ‘spiritual superiority.’

gates.name: 46 — Determination of the Self
gates.circuitry: Collective (Abstract) – Love of the body / serendipity
gates.core_theme: Being in the right place at the right time through embodiment.
gates.love_theme: Love of the body and life in form.
quotes: “Being at the right place at the right time.”
gates.notes: This is the ‘lucky’ gate when aligned. With 29 it forms the Channel of Discovery – perseverance through experience.

notes:
The G (Identity) Center is the seat of love, direction, and fixed identity. In Human Design it is where the Magnetic Monopole ‘holds’ the form together and steers it toward its correct geometry. A **defined G** has a consistent sense of who they are, whom they love, and the general direction life is taking. An **undefined / open G** samples identities, places, and loves, and is most correct when it lets *place and people* show it who it is.

Key Jovian-style lines (all < 25 words):
- “This is the center of love, direction, and identity.”
- “The Magnetic Monopole lives here.”
- “Place is destiny for the open G.”
- “Love is a frequency carried by the G Center.”

Distortion / not-self: trying to ‘find’ love or direction mentally instead of letting Strategy & Authority bring the right people and places to the G.
